name: You can´t pause a Space Shooter
name_original: You can´t pause a Space Shooter
description:
This is the single most accurat simulation of playing a retro-like Space Shooter. However the world is a place full of distractions. Everything is trying to stop you and end your epic space adventure. Hacker, earthquakes and even a furious creature from underneath. Can you beat the game anyway?

Control your space ship with "W,A,S,D" and shoot with "Space". Menus and "real life" problems can be solved by using your mouse. (Disclaimer: Some of your real life and personal problems may not be solved by using a mouse. Nevertheless we recommend the usage of a computer mouse and not a living one if you want to try it regardless.)

"You can´t pause a Space Shooter" was created during the GMTK GameJam 2020 in about 30 hours by a team of five for fun. The theme for the Jam was "Out of Control".

Credits

Real Human Games
Code&Concept - Alexis Chopin
2D Art - Joana Zimmermann
3D Art - Maria Reinhardt
Game Design - Wolfgang Lambotte

Sound&Music - Gidon Wolff
